name: BOSS FIGHT!
description:
Description:

"BOSS FIGHT!" takes the player on an epic adventure into the arena of bosses! Can you make it out alive!?!

Credits:

  • Onew4y + ShotgunFlamez
  • More credits in the in-game credits scene

How to play:

  • Use WASD/arrow keys to move
  • Left click to start charging spells
  • Right click to teleport a short distance(You teleport based on your last movement not the direction of the mouse)

This project is a submission to the first dev pad game jam, our interpretation of the theme is as follows.

When the theme was first announced we settled on our game to be a continuous BOSS FIGHT as boss fights require the player to time everything and learn about the opponent in order to win, hence our interpretation of the theme!
